Title: DROP SEQUENCE
Feature:
DropSequenceStmt ::=
    'DROP' 'SEQUENCE' IfExists TableNameList

IfExists ::= ( 'IF' 'EXISTS' )?

TableNameList ::=
    TableName ( ',' TableName )*

TableName ::=
    Identifier ('.' Identifier)?
Description: DROP SEQUENCE 语句用于删除序列对象。
Examples:
DROP SEQUENCE seq;
DROP SEQUENCE seq, seq2;
Category: Schema 管理与数据定义语句 (DDL)
